items.name: form_id
items.label:
Form ID
Identifier of the current form. Will be displayed-searchable in Inbox, Outbox and Sent Folders.
items.label_raw: Form ID Identifier of the current form. Will be displayed-searchable in Inbox, Outbox and Sent Folders.

survey.label:
Project Details
Project ID, Project Name
survey.label_raw: Project Details Project ID, Project Name

items.name: project_id
items.label: Project Number
items.hint: Provide the unique identifier for this project.
items.hint_raw: Provide the unique identifier for this project.

items.name: project_name
items.label: Project Name
items.hint: Provide the official name of the project.
items.hint_raw: Provide the official name of the project.

survey.label:
Location Details
Specific Location, General Location, County, State, etc.
survey.label_raw: Location Details Specific Location, General Location, County, State, etc.

items.name: loc_project
items.label: Specific Location
items.hint: The specific location within the primary project area. Auto-filled by field maps when possible.
items.hint_raw: The specific location within the primary project area. Auto-filled by field maps when possible.

items.name: loc_type
items.label: Location Type
items.hint: Indicate the type of location (e.g., structure, pull-site, parcel, culvert, etc.).  Auto-filled by field maps when possible.
items.hint_raw: Indicate the type of location (e.g., structure, pull-site, parcel, culvert, etc.). Auto-filled by field maps when possible.

items.name: loc_general
items.label: General Location/Area
items.hint: Describe the general location or larger area around the site.
items.hint_raw: Describe the general location or larger area around the site.

items.name: loc_county
items.label: County
items.hint: Provide the county where the project is taking place.
items.hint_raw: Provide the county where the project is taking place.

items.name: loc_state
items.label: State
items.hint: Provide the state where the project is situated.
items.hint_raw: Provide the state where the project is situated.

survey.label:
Monitoring/Inspection Details
Dates/Times, Total Hours, Weather, etc.
survey.label_raw: Monitoring/Inspection Details Dates/Times, Total Hours, Weather, etc.

items.name: monitor_name
items.label: Monitor Name
items.hint: Insert the name of the person or team monitoring the project.
items.hint_raw: Insert the name of the person or team monitoring the project.

items.name: monitor_date
items.label: Date of Monitoring/Inspection
items.hint: Select the date when the monitoring was conducted.
items.hint_raw: Select the date when the monitoring was conducted.

items.name: monitor_type
items.label: Monitoring/Inspection Type
items.hint: Additional Section will appear based on choice
items.hint_raw: Additional Section will appear based on choice

items.name: weather_sky
items.label: Sky Conditions
items.hint: Describe the general weather conditions during the monitoring.
items.hint_raw: Describe the general weather conditions during the monitoring.

items.name: weather_wind
items.label: Wind Conditions
items.hint: Note the wind speed during monitoring.
items.hint_raw: Note the wind speed during monitoring.

items.name: weather_temperature
items.label: Temperature (F)
items.hint: Note down the temperature at the time of monitoring.
items.hint_raw: Note down the temperature at the time of monitoring.

survey.label:
Construction Details
Company, Foreman, Activites, etc.
survey.label_raw: Construction Details Company, Foreman, Activites, etc.

items.name: company
items.label: Company
items.hint: Name the construction company involved in the project.
items.hint_raw: Name the construction company involved in the project.

items.name: foreman
items.label: Foreman
items.hint: Provide the foreman's name who is supervising the project.
items.hint_raw: Provide the foreman's name who is supervising the project.

items.name: construction_activites_specific
items.label: Specific Construction Activities
items.hint: List the construction activities taking place.
items.hint_raw: List the construction activities taking place.

items.name: construction_equipment
items.label: Construction Equipment
items.hint: Describe the equipment being used for construction.
items.hint_raw: Describe the equipment being used for construction.

items.name: construction_other
items.label: Other Activites/Equipment
items.hint: Include any other activities or equipment not previously listed.
items.hint_raw: Include any other activities or equipment not previously listed.

survey.label:
Compliance/Permit Conditions
Compliance Categories, Description, Who was notified, etc.
survey.label_raw: Compliance/Permit Conditions Compliance Categories, Description, Who was notified, etc.

items.name: compliance_related
items.label: Is this inspection related to any of the following?
items.label_raw: Is this inspection related to any of the following?

survey.label:
Natural Resources
SS Species, Habitat, Action Taken, etc.
survey.label_raw: Natural Resources SS Species, Habitat, Action Taken, etc.

items.name: nr_species_to_survey
items.label: Sensitive Species Surveyed for
items.hint: include summary of all sensitive animal and plant species observations, if any
items.hint_raw: include summary of all sensitive animal and plant species observations, if any

items.name: nr_name
items.label: Description of Resources
items.hint: Include observed resources, habitat, health, etc.
items.hint_raw: Include observed resources, habitat, health, etc.

survey.label:
Cultural Resources
Discovery, Protections, Notifications

items.name: cr_yn
items.label: Were cultural remains exposed during construction activities?
items.label_raw: Were cultural remains exposed during construction activities?

items.name: cr_description
items.label: Description of Discovery
items.hint: Include relevant site or feature id(s)
items.hint_raw: Include relevant site or feature id(s)

survey.label:
SWPPP
BMPs, actions, etc.

items.name: swppp_action
items.label: Do BMPs require action or repair?
items.label_raw: Do BMPs require action or repair?

survey.label:
Paleo Resources
Discovery, Protections, Notifications

items.name: paleo_yn
items.label: Was paleo locality found during construction activities?
items.label_raw: Was paleo locality found during construction activities?

items.name: paleo_description
items.label: Description of Discovery
items.hint: Include relevant fossil locality or geologic unit id(s)
items.hint_raw: Include relevant fossil locality or geologic unit id(s)

survey.label:
Spill Inspection
Spill Material, Cause, Amount, etc.
survey.label_raw: Spill Inspection Spill Material, Cause, Amount, etc.

items.name: datetime_rep
items.label: Date and Time Spill was Reported:
items.hint: Required Field. Record the Date and Time the Spill was Reported:
items.label_raw: Date and Time Spill was Reported:
items.hint_raw: Required Field. Record the Date and Time the Spill was Reported:

items.name: spillmat
items.label: Spill Material:
items.hint: Required Field. Select Spill Material:
items.hint_raw: Required Field. Select Spill Material:

items.name: spillmat_oth
items.label: Other Spill Material:
items.hint: Required Field if Spill Material Selected is "Other" (255 character limit)
items.hint_raw: Required Field if Spill Material Selected is "Other" (255 character limit)

items.name: spill_cause
items.label: Cause of Spill:
items.hint: Required Field. Detail the Cause of the Spill. *
items.hint_raw: Required Field. Detail the Cause of the Spill. *

items.name: spill_amount
items.label: Volume of Spill Material:
items.hint: Required Field. Approximate volume of spill material (**NOT VOLUME OF SOIL IMPACTED**; consult with cleanup crew)
items.hint_raw: Required Field. Approximate volume of spill material (**NOT VOLUME OF SOIL IMPACTED**; consult with cleanup crew)

items.name: spill_unit
items.label: Unit of Volume:
items.hint: Required Field. Select Volume Units (1 cup = 8oz):
items.hint_raw: Required Field. Select Volume Units (1 cup = 8oz):

items.name: spill_area
items.label: Area of Impact:
items.hint: Required Field. Length x Width OR Length x Width x Depth
items.hint_raw: Required Field. Length x Width OR Length x Width x Depth

items.name: area_unit
items.label: Unit of Area of Impact:
items.hint: Approximate area and units of spill material (consult with cleanup crew)
items.hint_raw: Approximate area and units of spill material (consult with cleanup crew)

items.name: spill_watercontact
items.label: Has the Spill Come Into Contact with Water Sources:
items.hint: Required Field
items.label_raw: Has the Spill Come Into Contact with Water Sources:
items.hint_raw: Required Field

items.name: response
items.label: Spill Response Actions:
items.hint: Required Field. Select All Spill Actions that Apply:
items.hint_raw: Required Field. Select All Spill Actions that Apply:

items.name: response_oth
items.label: Other Responses:
items.hint: Required Field if Response is "Other" (255 character limit)
items.hint_raw: Required Field if Response is "Other" (255 character limit)

items.name: further_actions
items.label: Further Actions:
items.hint: Required Field. Are further actions required?
items.hint_raw: Required Field. Are further actions required?

items.name: note_actions
items.label: Describe Additional Actions:
items.hint: Required Field if Further Actions Selected is "Yes" (255 character limit)
items.hint_raw: Required Field if Further Actions Selected is "Yes" (255 character limit)

survey.name: monitoring_photo
survey.label:
Photo Log
Click the "Add" button ("+" icon) to record multiple photos. Each photo will be associated with a point at your current location.
survey.label_raw: Photo Log Click the "Add" button ("+" icon) to record multiple photos. Each photo will be associated with a point at your current location.
